pulled transcription from Primary Source Media

body.p:
George is all right, unhurt, up to Tuesday morning, 10th inst—the 51st was in a bad battle last Friday, lost 20 killed, between 40 & 50 wounded—I have just seen
some of the 51st wounded, just arrived, one of them Fred Saunders, Corp[oral], Co K, George's company—he said when he left the 51st was in rear on guard duty—he left Tuesday mn'g last—the papers have it that Burnside's Corps was in a fight Tuesday, but I think it most probable the 51st was not in it—
Fred McReady is wounded, badly, but not seriously—Sims is safe—you see LeGendre is wounded—he was shot through the bridge of nose—
Mother, you ought to get this Friday forenoon, 13th—I will write again soon—wrote once before to-day—
